FC-FOOTLOCKER-V2.title: Footlocker Ammo Box V2
FC-FOOTLOCKER-V2.description: Lightweight 15/32 sheathing ply, dual removable trays.

FC-RB-300.title: Range Box 300
FC-RB-300.description: Compact box sized for three 4x4x2 trays.

FC-RB-1000-9.title: Range Box 1000 (9mm)
FC-RB-1000-9.description: Holds ~1000 rounds 9mm with sliding shelf; sold out example.

FC-RM-400.title: Rangemaster 400
FC-RM-400.description: Up to 400 rounds in one compact crate — no cardboard, no clutter, just ammo ready to load and shoot.

FC-CLASSIC.title: Freedom Crate Classic
FC-CLASSIC.description: The original handcrafted ammo box that launched Freedom Crate Co. Built for durability and timeless style, measurements based on a real Cold War-era ammunition box. Holds 1,000 rounds of 9mm. Interior dimensions: 11" wide × 8¼" long × 5½" deep.
